name: Sustainable Energy Microsystems
membership:
New Nuclear  Watch Europe
Low Carbon Energy Development Network
goal: Design of a prototype for a thorium-fuelled molten salt reactor. Output 10 megawatts and transportable. Purpose is to present a source of carbon-neutral energy with a view to mitigating climate change and averting energy poverty in developing countries. Applications include ships propulsion, liquid fuel synthesis, desalination and space applications.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Survey on Greenhouse Gasses and Climate Change - to be submitted
